1.content: Implementasi Composable Context Architecture untuk ZKx401
1.details:
1. Refactor existing agent system dengan composable contexts
2. Create separated contexts: PrivacyContext, PaymentContext, BlockchainContext, AgentDeploymentContext
3. Implement context composition using .use() pattern seperti Daydreams
4. Add TypeScript type safety untuk semua contexts

2.details:
1. Create dual-tier memory system (Working Memory + Context Memory)
2. Add automatic persistence untuk user sessions
3. Implement memory isolation between contexts
4. Add memory query and retrieval functionality

3.details:
1. Create MCP extension system untuk ZKx401
2. Add support untuk filesystem, database, dan external APIs
3. Implement Universal Tool Access
4. Create connector untuk popular MCP servers

4.details:
1. Create dreamsRouter untuk multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Groq)
2. Add automatic provider fallback
3. Implement pay-per-use dengan USDC micropayments
4. Add OpenAI compatible API endpoints
